app.title: PII Anonymiser
app.subtitle: Upload documents to automatically detect and sanitize personally identifiable information

upload.heading: Drop your file here
upload.text: or click to browse from your computer

processing.title: Sanitization Results
processing.success: File successfully processed and sanitized. Ready to download.

timeout.title: Processing Taking Longer Than Expected
timeout.message: The file processing is taking longer than expected. This may be due to a large or complex file.

modelDownload.title: Downloading AI Model
modelDownload.subtitle: One-time download for PII detection (~129 MB)

errors.network: Connection failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.diskSpace: Not enough disk space. Please free up at least 150 MB and try again.

errors.FILE_NOT_FOUND: The file could not be found.
errors.FILE_READ_ERROR: Unable to read the file. Please check permissions.
errors.FILE_WRITE_ERROR: Unable to write to the file. Please check permissions.
errors.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: This file type is not supported.
errors.FILE_TOO_LARGE: The file is too large to process.
errors.CONVERSION_FAILED: File conversion failed. Try a different format.
errors.PDF_PARSE_ERROR: Unable to read the PDF file.
errors.DOCX_PARSE_ERROR: Unable to read the Word document.
errors.EXCEL_PARSE_ERROR: Unable to read the Excel file.
errors.CSV_PARSE_ERROR: Unable to read the CSV file.
errors.PII_DETECTION_FAILED: PII detection failed. Please try again.
errors.MODEL_LOAD_ERROR: Failed to load the detection model.
errors.MODEL_DOWNLOAD_ERROR: Model download failed. Check your internet connection.
errors.IPC_TIMEOUT: The operation timed out. Please try again.
errors.IPC_CHANNEL_ERROR: Communication error. Please restart the application.
errors.OUT_OF_MEMORY: Not enough memory. Please close other applications.

accuracy.title: Accuracy Dashboard
accuracy.subtitle: Detection quality metrics over time
accuracy.noDataHint: Process documents and make corrections to see accuracy metrics

trends.title: Correction Trends
trends.noTrendData: Not enough data for trend analysis
